#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

char str[3000000];

int main(void)
{
	int T, i, temp, k;
	char C[100005];

	scanf("%d", &T);

	while (T--)
	{
		temp = 0;
		i = 0;
		k = 0;
		scanf("%s", C);

		while ((C[i] != '\0'))
		{
			temp = temp * 10 + C[i] - '0';
			temp = temp * 10 + C[i + 1] - '0';

			if (temp == 32 || (temp >= 65 && temp <= 90)
				|| (temp >= 97 && temp <= 99))
			{
				str[k++] = temp;
				temp = 0;
				i += 2;
			}
			else
			{
				temp = temp * 10 + C[i + 2] - '0';
				i += 3;
				str[k++] = temp;
				temp = 0;
			}
		}
		str[k] = '\0';

		printf("%s\n", str);
	}

	return 0;
}
